statements: SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics;
SELECT vehicle_id, acceleration_score FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE battery_health > 80;
SELECT energy_consumption, vehicle_id FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, acceleration_score, energy_consumption FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE acceleration_score < 0.5 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, acceleration_score, battery_health, energy_consumption FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE battery_health > 80 ORDER BY acceleration_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT energy_consumption, vehicle_id, acceleration_score FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE acceleration_score < 0.5 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_health FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE energy_consumption > 5 ORDER BY battery_health DESC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE battery_health BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY acceleration_score ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_capacity, range, efficiency FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE battery_capacity > 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, range FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE range >= 200 ORDER BY range DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_capacity, efficiency FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE efficiency < 0.3 ORDER BY battery_capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM charging_station WHERE availability = true ORDER BY charging_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE range > 200 ORDER BY efficiency DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_capacity, range FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE battery_capacity >= 50 AND efficiency < 0.05
SELECT * FROM charging_station WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT station_id, location, charging_speed FROM charging_station WHERE charging_speed > 10
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_capacity, range, efficiency FROM electric_vehicle_performance_metrics
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehiclesMetrics;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_level FROM ElectricVehiclesMetrics ORDER BY battery_level DESC;
SELECT station_id, location FROM ChargingStations WHERE chargers_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM ChargingHistory WHERE energy_delivered > 50 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, distance_traveled FROM ElectricVehiclesMetrics WHERE battery_level < 50;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehiclesMetrics WHERE battery_level > 50 ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(battery_level) AS average_battery_level, MAX(distance_traveled) AS max_distance_traveled FROM ElectricVehiclesMetrics;
SELECT vehicle_id, start_time, end_time, energy_delivered FROM ChargingHistory ORDER BY vehicle_id, start_time DESC;
SELECT location, chargers_count FROM ChargingStations WHERE chargers_count >= 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_level, distance_traveled, energy_consumed FROM ElectricVehiclesMetrics WHERE distance_traveled > 1000 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT model_name, battery_capacity FROM electric_vehicles WHERE mileage > 50000;
SELECT * FROM battery_performance ORDER BY charging_cycles DESC;
SELECT station_id, location FROM charging_stations WHERE charge_rate >= 10;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT model_name, battery_capacity FROM electric_vehicles WHERE mileage > 5000;
SELECT station_id, location, charge_rate FROM charging_stations ORDER BY charge_rate DESC;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT ev.vehicle_id, ev.model_name, bp.charging_cycles, bp.battery_health FROM electric_vehicles ev INNER JOIN battery_performance bp ON ev.vehicle_id = bp.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles LIMIT 5
SELECT brand, model, production_year FROM vehicles ORDER BY production_year DESC
SELECT brand, model, battery_capacity FROM vehicles ORDER BY brand ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, brand, model, production_year FROM vehicles WHERE brand='Tesla'
SELECT vehicle_id, brand, model, battery_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE production_year > 2015 ORDER BY vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY brand DESC, production_year ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT brand, model, production_year FROM vehicles WHERE production_year > 2015 ORDER BY brand ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, brand, model, production_year FROM vehicles WHERE brand = 'Tesla' AND production_year < 2020 ORDER BY production_year DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 60

SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.model, b.battery_level, r.range_remaining FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN battery_metrics b ON v.vehicle_id = b.vehicle_id INNER JOIN range_metrics r ON v.vehicle_id = r.vehicle_id WHERE b.battery_level > 50 AND r.range_remaining > 100 ORDER BY b.battery_level DESC LIMIT 5
